about_the_game:
Axom: Conquest Demo is the demo for the base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom.

Gather resources to build defences, unlock research between games to get stronger and ultimately unlock the secrets of the mysterious planet.

The Demo contains unlimited access to the first 30 waves and first 4 tiers of research between games.

Demo Features

  • Infinitely repayable procedurally generated levels - Each mission is different

  • Fight against the first 30 waves of combat.

  • Build your base - Construct towers, walls and hazards to defend your all important Nexus Drill from the hoards of Centurax trying to destroy it!

  • Wave based combat - Prepare and build in advance, then start the Nexus Drill, alerting all enemies in the area. Each wave the challenge grows stronger until you are ultimately defeated.

  • Two unique Biomes - In the Demo experience the blistering desert or frigid cold of Axom's deadly wasteland

  • Gather resources - Gather from the ground, build refineries on resource nodes scattered around the map, but defend them well to keep your income stream safe!

  • Upgrade buildings Infinitely - Upgrade building tiers as many times as you can afford in the demo! No Restrictions. 

  • Every game you get stronger - Collect research while in game to complete research aboard your ship which provide permanent advantages for each subsequent game.

  • In the Demo unlock the first 4 tiers of research.

  • Unlock new advanced structures - Dozens of buildings, towers and hazards to unlock as well as branching paths for tower upgrades.

Build your perfect defence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (2GB) / AMD Radeon RX 560 (2GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Axom: Conquest is a base building roguelite tower defence game set on the dangerous planet named Axom. Explore the map, find interesting upgrades and build the perfect defence. In this Demo, experience the first 30 waves of brutal wave based defence on two unique biomes.
